::Shadow Wing::

She got hit by the optic blasts and was knocked over.  She had a 
large gash in her stomach and lays still for a moment. Tries to get 
up.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Lord Unitron" <KSLawdogg@c...> wrote:
> Serpentor:
> 
> Serpentor saw Shadow Wing get up and laughed.  "BIG mistake, stupid 
> Maximal." he fired off a three optic blasts at her abdomen, a blast 
> from his plasma launcher several inches down her head, laughing as 
it 
> flew down the hallway, exploding against a wall.
